member.name: M:Mobile.Networking.Common.TelnetBase.ReceivingMethod
member.summary: The method called by the receiving thread. It should check if the connection is established and read from the underlying Stream. Anything that is needed to check for incoming messages should be placed inside this method. Easy way: This method should handle the connection and call to receive and signal lines. It is called frequently to secure reading from stream within time needed.
